channel.title: Does anyone know how to fix the Range PKing bug on Pimpscape source?
channel.description:
Yes, i'm playing on a server that uses pimpscape source (Not many of you probably remember old pimpscape, but regardless, this one is far from theold version)
When you range 1.) It's slow, but i can fix that 2.) you don't get "pk points" or "kills" for killing someone with range.. that's the main problem... anyone know how to fix it? (If you could post code to fix the speed to make it faster just so i know i'm right, instead of being wrong for some reason, lol, it'd help... Thanks!)[br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2007, 06:23:09 PM[/size][hr]Anyone??

item.title: Does anyone know how to fix the Range PKing bug on Pimpscape source?
item.dc:creator: @Patchumz Patchumz
item.description:
@Patchumz wrote:

Lol, not helping I luffs ranged.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2007, 03:27:25 PM[/size][hr][me=Patchumz]sighs[/me]

Guess no one can do this one?!
